content.name: Shovel
content.description: A shovel is a pretty basic agricultural
tool, but have you ever tried farming without one?

content.name: Tractor
content.description: A tractor is a machine that can massively
increase the efficiency of a farm. Buying a tractor
is one of the most straightforward ways to raise your
GDP.

content.name: Cow
content.description: The Hindu religion considers cows to be holy,
and when you see how useful these bovine animals are,
a healthy respect (or even religious reverence) for these
animals makes a lot of sense.

content.name: Schoolhouse
content.description: A village is full of elders that can pass
down their wisdom, even though most of them will not
have formal training. A Schoolhouse gives your village
or city a place to gather the young to learn from the
wise.

content.name: Dirt Road
content.description: A dirt road is cheap, but making one creates
a massive efficiency increase over just traveling through
untamed land. Ultimately, dirt roads are essential for
any early stage village to be able to trade without
paying too much in travel costs.

content.name: Paved Road
content.description: For the villages and cities with a little
bit more money, a paved road will last longer than a
dirt road, and represents a greater efficiency increase
too.

content.name: Corner Shop
content.description: Back in the day, everbody made the goods they
needed to live: food, soap, clothing, furniture, and more.
The problem is making all of that was difficult and took
most of people's time. By relying on specialists to
produce each category of merchandise, and then selling
that merchandise in a store, we can produce massive
increases in efficiency.

content.name: Market
content.description: A corner shop is great for a village with
fewer people and fewer needs than a medium-sized city,
but a successful village will eventually need a more
serious location for commerce.

content.name: Supermarket
content.description: Every industrialized city in the world
has several, and if your city is big enough, your
residents could also benefit from a supermarket.

content.name: Solar Panels
content.description: Modern technology relies on energy, and most
forms of energy require a complicated infrastructure.
A solar panel system allows your village to use basic
electronics without having to invest in a significant
amount of infrastructure.

content.name: Power Plant
content.description: Solar panels are great for energy... but not
when the weather is bad or at night. When your village's
energy demands increase, a power plant can provide
exactly what is needed.
